extras.name: Mentor/Founder
extras.details: We mentor college students in various aspects of life. Key responsibilities include helping students achieve academic excellence and training them in soft skills.

extras.name: Founder
extras.details: An initiative focused on increasing access to ICT for underprivileged youths by mobilizing and donating computers to secondary schools.

extras.name: Director of Campus Ministry
extras.details: Responsible for overseeing a mentorship program in college campuses and leading campus mentors. Key achievements include expanding the ministry's presence from 2 campuses to over 15 campuses, and personally launching 5 new campuses.
